title: Great variety tampons
content: The Tampax Pearl Trio Pack came in such a great variety. It has the regular, super, and super plus which makes it great for all the different stages of flow type. It was very easy to use and feels comfortable to do all my regular activities throughout the day. I didn't find the need to use a pad too since I was changing as needed and also because of using the right tampon during the right flow that I was experiencing. I definitely recommend to buy the variety trio pack.
